name: Silly Goblins
description:
My entry for the 7 Day Roguelike jam 2017. Can you sneak (and bash) your way to the ultimate prize on level 7? Only one way to find out!

What is it?
A stealth-focused 2d sidescrolling pixelart game with permadeath, procedurally generated levels (more or less) and artificial intelligence of dubious quality. It's also quite fun to play.
